column1: The Orfalch Echor was the ravine of the Dry River in the Encircling Mountains
column2: the route by which the hidden city of Gondolin was approached.  At its lower end was the First Gate
column3: the Gate of Wood. The Orfalch continued through the remainder of the Seven Gates of Gondolin
column5: the Gate of Steel.  At the upper end was a high sward that offered a view of Tumladen and the city in its center.
